entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Trois-Pistoles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
